Package ussr.description.robot

Basic building blocks for describing robots in terms of the individual components that make up the module, connectors mounted on each module, etc.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConnectorDescription Description of a single connector, relative to the module component on which it is to be mounted
ConnectorDescription.Common Provide default values for connector properties that are common to several connectors
ModuleComponentDescription Description of a module component: one of the parts that makes up a complete module.
ReceivingDevice Abstract description of a receiving device
RobotDescription A description of the geometry of a complete robot module, including the shape of the core, the shape of a connector, and the positions of the connectors and their range.
TransmissionDevice Abstract description of a transmission device
 

Enum Summary
ConnectorDescription.Type The connector type used on the robot
RobotDescription.PhysicsCompositionStructure Abstract description of how the robot is assembled TODO: not currently used, remove?
 

Package ussr.description.robot Description

Basic building blocks for describing robots in terms of the individual components that make up the module, connectors mounted on each module, etc.
